scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run package && npm run transfer
scripts.deploy:start: ssh rpi5-streamer.local 'cd ~/trix-hub && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d'
scripts.deploy:stop: ssh rpi5-streamer.local 'cd ~/trix-hub && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down'
scripts.deploy:restart: ssh rpi5-streamer.local 'cd ~/trix-hub && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml restart'
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy && npm run deploy:load && npm run deploy:start
